answers.author: Elizabeth Wadle
answers.text:
There are some good measures in the ICMA-CPM Risk Management Template - 1) Liability Claims per 10K population, and 2) Percentage of General Liability Claims that Proceed to Litigation. Additional measures we use are 1) Percentage of Claims Resolved without Payment, and 2) Percentage of Lawsuits Resolved in Favor of the City within Established Settlement Range.
